To use the tutorials and other material we will use a combination of [R](https://cran.r-project.org/), [RStudio](http://www.RStudio.com), and [Github](http://www.github.com).

R, RStudio and Github. 

* To start open up (or download) [RStudio](http://www.RStudio.com)
* Next, go to File->New Project
<center>
<div style="width:500px; height=400px">
![](figures/RStudioGit1.PNG)
</div>
</center>
* Select Version Control -> Git
<center>
<div style="width:500px; height=400px">
![](figures/RStudioGit2.PNG)
</div>
</center>
* Type in <https://github.com/zalmquist/ERGM_Lab.git> and use *ergm_lab* for the project name. I recommend saving the project on your Desktop.
<center>
<div style="width:500px; height=400px">
![](figures/RStudioGit3.PNG)
</div>
</center>
* The result should look something like this!
<center>
<div style="width:500px; height=400px">
![](figures/RStudioGit4.PNG)
</div>
</center>
